title: Login Window: Scripts (com.apple.mcxloginscripts)
description: The payload that configures scripts to run at login and logout.

loginscripts.title: Login script
loginscripts.description: An array of one or more dictionaries of scripts to run at user login time.

skipLoginHook.title: Execute the Mac computer's LoginHook script
skipLoginHook.description: If 'true', the system doesn't execute the login scripts during login.

logoutscripts.title: Logout script
logoutscripts.description: An array of one or more dictionaries of scripts to run at user logout time.

skipLogoutHook.title: Execute the Mac computer's LogoutHook script
skipLogoutHook.description: If 'true', the system doesn't execute the logout scripts during logout.
